SooperFish 0.3, 13-09-2012
----------------------

- Added better touchscreen support, you can now make a parent menu item a
  span tag instead of an anchor tag and it will function as a toggle to show
  and hide the menu. It will then not function as a link.

SooperFish 0.2, 15-06-2010
----------------------

- Added classnames to indicate when menus are multicolumn
- Checked compatibility with jQuery 1.4, worked fine for me

SooperFish 0.1, 03-06-2010
----------------------

- Added documentation and example files
- Created the first package for distribution
